Risk comes from not knowing what you are doing. The more information you have, the less risk you take in any given action. Everyone says, "Do your own research!" But how? Where would you start? Crypto is still the wild west to many and exploring cryptocurrency tokens can be a daunting task. But how does one conduct good research? What do you look for when you analyse a cryptocurrency token? Which is more important? Use case, incentives or how you would benefit from the token? Read up how does the FLOWTRADE.ai AIZ token work and let us know your thoughts ðŸ’¬ https://lnkd.in/dnHDsmSh

As cryptocurrencies and other digital assets gain traction in the mainstream, institutional investors are increasingly drawn to the potential of these emerging markets and the underlying technologies that power them. More major traditional finance (TradFi) institutions and governing bodies are either already embracing blockchain solutions or exploring ways to do so. The number of such adopters is expected to grow as the industry matures. Learn more about developments and players that drive the institutional adoption of crypto on the Kinetex blog. (https://lnkd.in/epTDCxsF) #blockchain #crypto #DeFi #Web3 #Kinetex
